b2bpl.translation
Class ModifiesFilter

java.lang.Object
  b2bpl.translation.CodeGenerator
      b2bpl.translation.ModifiesFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
TranslationConstants
public class ModifiesFilter
extends CodeGenerator

A translator for BML store references.

This translator can be used to translate BML store references to a BoogiePL predicate which is true if and only if a given location does not contain any of the BML store references of a modifies clause. The translator supports method as well as loop modifies clauses and it must be parameterized with the names of the variables relevant to the context in which the modifies clause appears. Since this parameterization is different for method and loop modifies clauses, specialized factory methods are provided for constructing translators for the two contexts.

Author:
Ovidio Mallo

thisReference - The name of the variable representing the this object.
localVariables - The names of the local variables.
stackElements - The names of the stack variables.
oldLocalVariables - The names of the old local variables.
location - The name of the variable representing the location in the heap containing the store references of the modifies clause.

Static factory method for creating a filter for loop modifies clauses.

Parameters:
heap - The name of the current heap variable.
oldHeap - The name of the old heap variable.
thisReference - The name of the variable representing the this object.
localVariables - The names of the local variables.
stackElements - The names of the stack variables.
parameters - The parameter names of the method in which the specification appears (used as the old local variables).
location - The name of the variable representing the location in the heap containing the store references of the modifies clause.

translate

public BPLExpression translate(TranslationContext context,
                               BMLStoreRef... storeRefs)
Performs the actual translation of the given BML store references and returns a BoogiePL predicate which is true if and only if the location passed to the constructor of this class does not contain any of the store references provided here.

Parameters:
context - The TranslationContext to be used for translating type/field/constant/... references.
storeRefs - The specification to be translated.
Returns:
The BoogiePL predicate which filters out all the locations corresponding to the given BML store references.
